backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented frontend features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style sheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up SEO metadata and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling the landing page structure with header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section describing the foundationâ€™s mission and core values with icon cards.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section presenting email, phone, location details, and an urgent-notice message.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying logo, mission text, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/GetInvolved.tsx: Section listing ways to support the foundation and providing a scroll-to-contact call-to-action.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero banner with background image, foundation title, tagline, and scroll-triggering buttons.
frontend/src/components/LandingSection.t: Reusable wrapper component providing consistent layout, spacing, and section headings.
frontend/src/components/Programs.tsx: Renders a Programs section listing four program cards with icons, titles, and descriptions within a styled landing section.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scrolling navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity authentication context and provider handling login, stored identity loading, and state utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and custom theme variables for a warm charity color palette with light/dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins aligned with the project's design system.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, features, and asset needs for the CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION site.
